Package com.pandora.general.services.calculation.interfaces

Interface CellTimestepService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CellTimestepServiceImpl
public interface CellTimestepService
The CellTimestepService interface defines methods for calculating the time series of cell timesteps for a given geographical cell. It includes methods to calculate a time series starting from a specified time and for a specified number of timesteps, as well as to calculate the next cell timestep for a given cell at a specific time.
Version:
0.0.1
Author:
Wim Joost van Hoek

  • Method Details

    • calculateTimeSeries

      List<CellTimestep> calculateTimeSeries(Cell cell, LocalDateTime t0, int numberOfTimesteps)
      Calculates the time series of cell timesteps for the given cell starting from the specified time and for the specified number of timesteps.
      Parameters:
      cell - The geographical cell for which the time series is calculated.
      t0 - The starting time of the time series.
      numberOfTimesteps - The number of timesteps to calculate.
      Returns:
      A list of calculated cell timesteps.

    • calculateNextTimestep

      CellTimestep calculateNextTimestep(Cell cell, LocalDateTime t0)
      Calculates the next cell timestep for the given cell at the specified time.
      Parameters:
      cell - The geographical cell for which the timestep is calculated.
      t0 - The starting time of the timestep.
      Returns:
      The calculated cell timestep.
